name: Real Estate Agent
author: RealtyBaron

sections.description:
A WordPress Plugin that conveniently displays an agent’s AgentRank data — profile, sales, reviews, forecasts, etc — from RealtyBaron.

Features include:

  • Free – no cost to download, install, and/or use the plug-in.
  • Lead Generation – a new source of leads as visitors read about your sales activity, client endorsements, and market predictions.
  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) – Each sale transaction, client endorsement, and market prediction creates a new page on your blog for search engines to index.

Demo

None
sections.installation:
Install Plugin Using Search

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New in WordPress admin
  2. Search for “agentrank”
  3. Click Install link in Actions column
  4. Once a box appears, click the big red button Install Now
  5. Once installed, click Activate Plugin link
  6. Configure the plugin through Settings > agentrank in WordPress admin

..or..

Install Plugin in .ZIP Format

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New > Upload in WordPress admin
  2. Upload agentrank.zip file
  3. Once uploaded, click Activate Plugin link
  4. Configure the plugin through Settings > agentrank in WordPress admin

..and finally..

Install Widget on Sidebar

  1. Visit Appearance > Widgets in WordPress admin
  2. Drag ‘n drop agentrank Widget onto Sidebar 1
sections.faq:
I installed the plugin. Why does nothing appear in my sidebar?

Did you install the widget? If not, please read Install Widget on Sidebar on the Installation tab.

I installed the widget. Why do no questions appear in my sidebar?

It’s quite possible no questions have been asked in the location you’ve specified in the configuration. Feel welcome to ask some questions yourself to “seed” your sidebar.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0-beta (8-9-2010)

  1. Initial import

Version 1.0.0-b1 (12-28-2010)

  1. Added admin options
  2. Added AgentRank Sale Transactions Widget

Version 1.0.0-b2 (12-31-2010)

  1. Added API Register Form and Username Reminder Request.
  2. Added AgentRank Client Reviews Widget
  3. Added AgentRank Market Forecasts Widget

Version 1.0.0-rc1 (1-7-2011)

  1. Added AgentRank Contact Form Widget.
  2. Added Lead Form.
  3. Added Agent Fullname admin setting.

Version 1.0.0-rc2 (1-14-2010)

  1. Fixed sidebar widgets list items.
  2. Fixed View all Sales, Reviews, Forecasts, list items.
  3. Added Charts to View all Sales, Reviews, Forecasts.
  4. Removed header from AgentRank Contact Form Widget. Use Widget title instead.
  • Version 1.0.0-rc3 (1-26-2011) =
  1. Changed chart size and arrangement.
  2. Centered pagination links.
  3. Replaced page title of market forecasts.
  • Version 1.0.0-rc4 (2-1-2011) =
  1. Added local ‘width’ style to charts
  2. Decreased ‘look back’ from 5 to 3 yrs
  • Version 1.0.0-rc5 (2-1-2011) =
  1. Modified chart margins

short_description: Real Estate Agent plugin enables professionals to host their AgentRank profile in a sidebar.
